KS Chart data

Source: R/blr-plots-data.R
blr_prep_kschart_data.Rd

Data for generating KS chart.

blr_prep_kschart_data(gains_table)

blr_prep_kschart_line(gains_table)

blr_prep_ksannotate_y(ks_line)

blr_prep_kschart_stat(ks_line)

blr_prep_ksannotate_x(ks_line)

Arguments

gains_table

An object of clas blr_gains_table.
ks_line

Overall conversion rate.

Examples

model <- glm(honcomp ~ female + read + science, data = hsb2,
             family = binomial(link = 'logit'))
gt <- blr_gains_table(model)
blr_prep_kschart_data(gt)
#> # A tibble: 11 x 3
#>    cum_total_per cum_1s_per cum_0s_per
#>            <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl>
#>  1           0        0         0     
#>  2           0.1      0.264     0.0408
#>  3           0.2      0.509     0.0884
#>  4           0.3      0.698     0.156 
#>  5           0.4      0.830     0.245 
#>  6           0.5      0.887     0.361 
#>  7           0.6      0.943     0.476 
#>  8           0.7      0.962     0.605 
#>  9           0.8      1         0.728 
#> 10           0.9      1         0.864 
#> 11           1        1         1     
ks_line <- blr_prep_kschart_line(gt)
blr_prep_kschart_stat(ks_line)
#> [1] 59
blr_prep_ksannotate_y(ks_line)
#> [1] 0.5375433
blr_prep_ksannotate_x(ks_line)
#> [1] 0.5
